workshoptitle: Ingesting Application, Compute & Network Logs from OnPrem & Cloud

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Ingesting Linux or Windows Logs with Management Agent
Lab 2: Ingesting Logs from Object Storage
Lab 3: Ingesting Logs from OCI Services using Service Connector Hub
Lab 5: Bulk Management Agent Installation On-Prem (Optional)
Lab 6: Bulk Management Agent Installation on OCI Compute (Optional)
Lab 7: Enterprise Manager Target Monitoring and Entity Model Harvesting
Lab 8: Cross Tenancy Log Collection using Object Storage
Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
